name: Apple On The Walls
description:
Hello there ! :)

Apple On The Walls is my entry for the 133rd Weekly Game jam which theme was "wall jump".

This game is a Puzzle Platformer, where you take control of walls to move your avatar instead of controlling him directly.

This version is the Jam Version, which is pretty short, but will be updated after this week with new levels and new concepts.

Feel free to comment on it or to Pm me directly if any issue / question / suggestions
